achievement.name: Head of the Class
achievement.description: Play a complete round with every class.

achievement.name: World Traveler
achievement.description: Play a complete game on 2Fort, Dustbowl, Granary, Gravel Pit, Hydro, and Well (CP).

achievement.name: Team Doctor
achievement.description: Accumulate 25000 heal points as a Medic.

achievement.name: Flamethrower
achievement.description: Set five enemies on fire in 30 seconds.

achievement.name: Sentry Gunner
achievement.description: Accumulate 10 sentry gun kills with a single sentry.

achievement.name: Nemesis
achievement.description: Get five revenge kills.

achievement.name: Hard to Kill
achievement.description: Get five kills in a row without dying.

achievement.name: Master of Disguise
achievement.description: Trick an opposing Medic into healing you.

achievement.name: Dynasty
achievement.description: Win 20 games.

achievement.name: Hardcore
achievement.description: Accumulate 1000 total kills.

achievement.name: Grey Matter
achievement.description: Get 25 headshots as a Sniper.

achievement.name: First Do No Harm
achievement.description: Play a full round without killing any enemies, and score the highest on a team of 6 or more players.

achievement.name: Quadruple Bypass
achievement.description: Heal a teammate who's taking fire from 4 enemies at once.

achievement.name: Group Health
achievement.description: Work with 2 other Medics to deploy 3 simultaneous ÜberCharges.

achievement.name: Surgical Prep
achievement.description: Have an ÜberCharge ready before the Setup phase ends.

achievement.name: Trauma Queen
achievement.description: Deploy 3 ÜberCharges in less than 5 minutes, and assist in 5 kills during that time.

achievement.name: Double Blind Trial
achievement.description: Deploy an ÜberCharge within 8 seconds of a nearby enemy Medic deploying his.

achievement.name: Play Doctor
achievement.description: In a team with no Medics, be the first person to switch to Medic after a teammate calls for 'Medic!', and then heal 500 health.

achievement.name: Triage
achievement.description: Deploy an ÜberCharge on a teammate less than a second before they're hit by a critical explosive.

achievement.name: Preventive Medicine
achievement.description: Block the enemy from capturing a control point with an ÜberCharged teammate.

achievement.name: Consultation
achievement.description: Assist a fellow Medic in killing 3 enemies in a single life.

achievement.name: Does It Hurt When I Do This?
achievement.description: Kill 50 Scouts with your syringe gun.

achievement.name: Peer Review
achievement.description: Kill 10 Medics with your bone saw.

achievement.name: Big Pharma
achievement.description: Assist a Heavy in killing 10 enemies, where neither of you die.

achievement.name: You'll Feel a Little Prick
achievement.description: Assist in killing 3 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Scout.

achievement.name: Autoclave
achievement.description: Assist in burning 5 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Pyro.

achievement.name: Blunt Trauma
achievement.description: Assist in punching 2 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Heavy.

achievement.name: Midwife Crisis
achievement.description: Heal an Engineer as he repairs his sentry gun while it's under enemy fire.

achievement.name: Ubi concordia, ibi victoria
achievement.description: Assist in killing 3 enemies on an enemy control point, in a single life.

achievement.name: Grand Rounds
achievement.description: Heal 200 teammates after they've called for 'Medic!'.

achievement.name: Powerhouse Offense
achievement.description: Win 2Fort with a shutout.

achievement.name: Lightning Offense
achievement.description: Win Well in 5 minutes or less.

achievement.name: Relentless Offense
achievement.description: Win Hydro without giving up a capture.

achievement.name: Impenetrable Defense
achievement.description: Successfully defend Dustbowl without giving up a capture.

achievement.name: Impossible Defense
achievement.description: Successfully defend Gravel Pit without giving up a capture.

achievement.name: Infernal Medicine
achievement.description: Extinguish 100 burning teammates.

achievement.name: Doctor Assisted Homicide
achievement.description: Assist in killing 20 nemeses.

achievement.name: Placebo Effect
achievement.description: Kill 2 enemies in a single life, while having your ÜberCharge ready, but undeployed.

achievement.name: Sawbones
achievement.description: Hit enemies with your bonesaw 5 times in a row without dying or missing.

achievement.name: Intern
achievement.description: Accumulate 7000 heal points in a single life.

achievement.name: Specialist
achievement.description: Accumulate 10000 heal points health in a single life.

achievement.name: Chief of Staff
achievement.description: Accumulate 1 million total heal points.

achievement.name: Hypocritical Oath
achievement.description: Kill an enemy Spy that you have been healing.

achievement.name: Autopsy Report
achievement.description: Provide an enemy with a freezecam shot of you taunting above their ragdoll.

achievement.name: FYI I am A Medic
achievement.description: Use your bonesaw to kill a spy who has been calling for 'Medic!'.

achievement.name: House Call
achievement.description: Join a game that one of your friends is in and then deploy an ÜberCharge on him.

achievement.name: Bedside Manner
achievement.description: Be healing a teammate as he achieves an achievement of his own.

achievement.name: Blast Assist
achievement.description: Assist in exploding 5 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Soldier.

achievement.name: Medic Milestone 1
achievement.description: Achieve 10 of the achievements in the Medic pack.

achievement.name: Medic Milestone 2
achievement.description: Achieve 16 of the achievements in the Medic pack.

achievement.name: Medic Milestone 3
achievement.description: Achieve 22 of the achievements in the Medic pack.

achievement.name: Combined Fire
achievement.description: Use your shotgun to finish off 20 players you've ignited.

achievement.name: Weenie Roast
achievement.description: Have 2 enemy Scouts on fire at the same time.

achievement.name: Baptism by Fire
achievement.description: Force 10 burning enemies to jump into water.

achievement.name: Fire and Forget
achievement.description: Kill 15 players while you're dead.

achievement.name: Firewall
achievement.description: Ignite 5 Spies who have a sapper on a friendly building.

achievement.name: Cooking the Books
achievement.description: Ignite 5 enemies carrying your intelligence.

achievement.name: Spontaneous Combustion
achievement.description: Ignite 10 cloaked Spies.

achievement.name: Trailblazer
achievement.description: Ignite 10 enemies that have recently used a teleporter.

achievement.name: Camp Fire
achievement.description: Kill 3 enemies in a row, all within the same area.

achievement.name: Lumberjack
achievement.description: Kill 3 people with your axe in one life.

achievement.name: Clearcutter
achievement.description: Kill 6 people with your axe in one life.

achievement.name: I Fry
achievement.description: Ignite 10 disguised Spies.

achievement.name: Firewatch
achievement.description: Ignite 10 Snipers while they are zoomed in.

achievement.name: Burn Ward
achievement.description: Ignite 3 Medics that are ready to deploy an ÜberCharge.

achievement.name: Makin' Bacon
achievement.description: Kill 50 Heavies with your flamethrower.

achievement.name: Plan B
achievement.description: Kill 10 enemies while you're both underwater.

achievement.name: Pyrotechnics
achievement.description: Kill 3 enemies in a single ÜberCharge.

achievement.name: Arsonist
achievement.description: Destroy 50 Engineer buildings.

achievement.name: Controlled Burn
achievement.description: Ignite 50 enemies capturing one of your control points.

achievement.name: Firefighter
achievement.description: Kill 500 enemies.

achievement.name: Pyromancer
achievement.description: Do 1 million points of total fire damage.

achievement.name: OMGWTFBBQ
achievement.description: Kill an enemy with a taunt.

achievement.name: Got A Light?
achievement.description: Ignite an enemy Spy while he's flicking a cigarette.

achievement.name: BarbeQueQ
achievement.description: Cause a dominated player to leave the server.

achievement.name: Dance Dance Immolation
achievement.description: Kill 3 enemies while they're taunting.

achievement.name: Pilot Light
achievement.description: Ignite a rocket-jumping Soldier while he's in midair.

achievement.name: Freezer Burn
achievement.description: Provide enemies with freezecam shots of each of your taunts.

achievement.name: Next of Kindling
achievement.description: Ignite an enemy, and the Medic healing him.

achievement.name: Hot on Your Heels
achievement.description: Kill 50 enemies with your flamethrower, from behind.

achievement.name: Second Degree Burn
achievement.description: Kill a burning enemy who was ignited by another Pyro.

achievement.name: Hotshot
achievement.description: Kill a Soldier with a reflected critical rocket.

achievement.name: Fire Chief
achievement.description: Kill 1000 enemies.

achievement.name: Attention Getter
achievement.description: Ignite 100 enemies with the flare gun.

achievement.name: Hot Potato
achievement.description: Reflect 100 projectiles with your compressed air blast.

achievement.name: Dead Heat
achievement.description: Kill an enemy in the same second that he kills you.

achievement.name: Pyro Milestone 1
achievement.description: Achieve 10 of the achievements in the Pyro pack.

achievement.name: Pyro Milestone 2
achievement.description: Achieve 16 of the achievements in the Pyro pack.

achievement.name: Pyro Milestone 3
achievement.description: Achieve 22 of the achievements in the Pyro pack.

achievement.name: Heavy Milestone 1
achievement.description: Achieve 10 of the achievements in the Heavy pack.

achievement.name: Heavy Milestone 2
achievement.description: Achieve 16 of the achievements in the Heavy pack.

achievement.name: Heavy Milestone 3
achievement.description: Achieve 22 of the achievements in the Heavy pack.

achievement.name: Iron Kurtain
achievement.description: Take 1000 points of damage in a single life.

achievement.name: Party Loyalty
achievement.description: Kill 50 enemies within 3 seconds of them attacking your Medic.

achievement.name: Red Oktoberfest
achievement.description: Earn a domination for a Medic who's healing you.

achievement.name: Show Trial
achievement.description: Kill an enemy with a taunt.

achievement.name: Crime and Punishment
achievement.description: Kill 10 enemies carrying your intelligence.

achievement.name: Class Struggle
achievement.description: Work with a friendly Medic to kill an enemy Heavy & Medic pair.

achievement.name: Stalin the Kart
achievement.description: Block the enemy from moving the payload cart 25 times.

achievement.name: Supreme Soviet
achievement.description: Get ÜberCharged 50 times.

achievement.name: Factory Worker
achievement.description: Kill 20 enemies while being recharged by a dispenser.

achievement.name: Soviet Union
achievement.description: Get 25 enemy kills where you either assist or are assisted by another Heavy.

achievement.name: 0wn the Means of Production
achievement.description: Remove 20 stickybombs by killing the Demomen who produced them.

achievement.name: Rasputin
achievement.description: In a single life, get shot, burned, bludgeoned, and receive explosive damage.

achievement.name: Icing on the Cake
achievement.description: Get 20 kills on players that you're dominating.

achievement.name: Crock Block
achievement.description: Survive a direct hit from a critical rocket.

achievement.name: Kollectivization
achievement.description: Get 1000 assists.

achievement.name: Spyalectical Materialism
achievement.description: Kill or assist in killing 10 cloaked Spies.

achievement.name: Permanent Revolution
achievement.description: Kill 5 enemies without spinning down your gun.

achievement.name: Heavy Industry
achievement.description: Fire $200,000 worth of minigun rounds in a single life.

achievement.name: Communist Mani-Fisto
achievement.description: Kill an enemy with a critical punch.

achievement.name: Redistribution of Health
achievement.description: Heal 1000 damage with med-kits in a single life.

achievement.name: Rationing
achievement.description: Kill an enemy with your shotgun while you're out of minigun ammo.

achievement.name: Vanguard Party
achievement.description: Be the first on your team to start capturing a control point in a round.

achievement.name: Pushkin the Kart
achievement.description: Get 50 caps on payload maps.

achievement.name: Marxman
achievement.description: Kill 10 enemies in mid-air with the minigun.

achievement.name: Gorky Parked
achievement.description: Kill 25 enemies while you're standing on a control point you own.

achievement.name: Purge
achievement.description: Kill 15 enemies capturing a control point you own.

achievement.name: Lenin A Hand
achievement.description: Help 5 teammates get revenge on their nemeses.

achievement.name: Five Second Plan
achievement.description: Kill an enemy in the first 5 seconds after you exit a teleporter.

achievement.name: Konspicuous Konsumption
achievement.description: Eat 100 sandviches.

achievement.name: Don't Touch Sandvich
achievement.description: Kill 50 Scouts using Natascha.

achievement.name: Borscht Belt
achievement.description: Kill 10 Heavies with The K.G.B.

achievement.name: First Blood
achievement.description: Get the first kill in an Arena match.

achievement.name: A Year to Remember
achievement.description: Get 2004 lifetime kills.

achievement.name: The Cycle
achievement.description: In a single life, kill an enemy while you are on the ground, in the air, and in the water.

achievement.name: Closer
achievement.description: Destroy 3 teleporter entrances.

achievement.name: If You Build It
achievement.description: Destroy 3 enemy buildings while they are still under construction.

achievement.name: Gun Down
achievement.description: Destroy an active sentry gun using your pistol.

achievement.name: Scout Milestone 1
achievement.description: Achieve 10 of the achievements in the Scout pack.

achievement.name: Scout Milestone 2
achievement.description: Achieve 16 of the achievements in the Scout pack.

achievement.name: Scout Milestone 3
achievement.description: Achieve 22 of the achievements in the Scout pack.

achievement.name: Batter Up
achievement.description: Perform 1000 double jumps.

achievement.name: Dodgers 1, Giants 0
achievement.description: Kill an enemy Heavy and take his Sandvich.

achievement.name: Batting the Doctor
achievement.description: Kill a Medic that is ready to deploy an ÜberCharge.

achievement.name: I'm Bat Man
achievement.description: Survive 500 damage in one life.

achievement.name: Pop Fly
achievement.description: Kill 20 players while double-jumping.

achievement.name: Round-Tripper
achievement.description: Capture the enemy intelligence 25 times.

achievement.name: Triple Steal
achievement.description: Capture the enemy intelligence 3 times in a single CTF round.

achievement.name: Artful Dodger
achievement.description: Dodge 1000 damage in a single life using your Bonk! Atomic Punch.

achievement.name: Fall Classic
achievement.description: Cause an environmental death or suicide using the Force-A-Nature's knockback.

achievement.name: Strike Zone
achievement.description: Kill or assist kill 50 enemies while they are stunned.

achievement.name: The Big Hurt
achievement.description: Stun 2 Medics that are ready to deploy an ÜberCharge.

achievement.name: Moon Shot
achievement.description: Stun an enemy for the maximum possible duration by hitting them with a long-range ball.

achievement.name: Beanball
achievement.description: Stun a Scout with their own ball.

achievement.name: Retire the Runner
achievement.description: Kill a Scout while they are under the effect of Crit-a-Cola.

achievement.name: Caught Napping
achievement.description: Kill 50 enemies from behind with the Force-A-Nature.

achievement.name: Side Retired
achievement.description: Capture the last point in a CP map.

achievement.name: Stealing Home
achievement.description: Start capping a capture point within a second of it becoming available.

achievement.name: Set the Table
achievement.description: Initiate 10 point captures that ultimately succeed.

achievement.name: Belittled Beleaguer
achievement.description: Kill an opposing player that has your intelligence while holding theirs.

achievement.name: No-Hitter
achievement.description: Steal and then capture the enemy intelligence without firing a shot.

achievement.name: Race for the Pennant
achievement.description: Run 25 kilometers.

achievement.name: Out of the Park
achievement.description: Bat an enemy 25 meters.

achievement.name: Rode Hard, Put Away Wet
achievement.description: Jarate an enemy that you're dominating.

achievement.name: Be Polite
achievement.description: Provide an enemy with a freezecam shot of you doffing your hat.

achievement.name: Be Efficient
achievement.description: Get 3 kills with the Sniper Rifle without missing a shot.

achievement.name: Have a Plan
achievement.description: Capture the flag in CTF.

achievement.name: Kill Everyone You Meet
achievement.description: Kill 1000 enemies.

achievement.name: Triple Prey
achievement.description: In a single round, get a kill with 3 different weapons.

achievement.name: Self-destruct Sequence
achievement.description: Headshot 10 enemy Snipers.

achievement.name: De-sentry-lized
achievement.description: Destroy 3 Engineer sentry guns.

achievement.name: Shoot the Breeze
achievement.description: Kill a fully invisible Spy in a single hit.

achievement.name: Dropped Dead
achievement.description: Kill a Scout in midair with your Sniper Rifle or the Huntsman.

achievement.name: The Last Wave
achievement.description: Provide an enemy with a freezecam shot of you waving to them.

achievement.name: Australian Rules
achievement.description: Dominate an enemy Sniper.

achievement.name: Kook the Spook
achievement.description: Kill 10 Spies with your Kukri.

achievement.name: Socket to Him
achievement.description: Headshot an enemy Demoman.

achievement.name: Not a Crazed Gunman, Dad
achievement.description: In a single life, kill 3 enemies while they are achieving an objective.

achievement.name: Trust Your Feelings
achievement.description: Get 5 kills with the Sniper Rifle without your scope.

achievement.name: Überectomy
achievement.description: Kill a Medic that is ready to deploy an ÜberCharge.

achievement.name: Consolation Prize
achievement.description: Get backstabbed 50 times.

achievement.name: Enemy at the Gate
achievement.description: Kill an opponent within the first second of a round.

achievement.name: Parting Shot
achievement.description: Headshot an enemy player the moment his invulnerability wears off.

achievement.name: My Brilliant Career
achievement.description: Top the scoreboard 10 times on teams of 6 or more players.

achievement.name: Shock Treatment
achievement.description: Kill a spy whose backstab attempt was blocked by your Razorback.

achievement.name: Saturation Bombing
achievement.description: Jarate 4 enemy players with a single throw.

achievement.name: Rain on Their Parade
achievement.description: Jarate an enemy and the Medic healing him.

achievement.name: Jarring Transition
achievement.description: Use Jarate to reveal a cloaked Spy.

achievement.name: Friendship is Golden
achievement.description: Extinguish a burning teammate with your Jarate.

achievement.name: William Tell Overkill
achievement.description: Pin an enemy Heavy to the wall via his head.

achievement.name: Beaux and Arrows
achievement.description: Kill a Heavy & Medic pair with the bow.

achievement.name: Robbin' Hood
achievement.description: Take down an intelligence carrier with a single arrow.

achievement.name: Pincushion
achievement.description: Hit an enemy with 3 arrows, without killing them.

achievement.name: Number One Assistant
achievement.description: Score 5 assists with the Jarate in a single round.

achievement.name: Shafted
achievement.description: Stab an enemy with an arrow.

achievement.name: Dead Reckoning
achievement.description: Kill an enemy with an arrow while you're dead.

achievement.name: Triplecrossed
achievement.description: Backstab 3 Snipers in a single life.

achievement.name: Counter Espionage
achievement.description: Backstab a disguised Spy.

achievement.name: Identity Theft
achievement.description: Backstab the enemy that you're currently disguised as.

achievement.name: FYI I am a Spy
achievement.description: Backstab a Medic who has healed you in the last 5 seconds.

achievement.name: The Man with the Broken Guns
achievement.description: Backstab an Engineer, then sap 3 of his buildings within 10 seconds.

achievement.name: Sapsucker
achievement.description: Sap an enemy building, then backstab the Engineer who built it within 5 seconds.

achievement.name: May I Cut In?
achievement.description: Backstab an enemy and the Medic healing him within 10 seconds of each other.

achievement.name: Agent Provocateur
achievement.description: Backstab your Steam Community friends 10 times.

achievement.name: The Melbourne Supremacy
achievement.description: Dominate a Sniper.

achievement.name: Spies Like Us
achievement.description: While cloaked, bump into an enemy cloaked Spy.

achievement.name: A Cut Above
achievement.description: Kill a gun-wielding Spy with your knife.

achievement.name: Burn Notice
achievement.description: Survive 30 seconds after being ignited while cloaked.

achievement.name: Die Another Way
achievement.description: Kill a Sniper after your backstab breaks his Razorback.

achievement.name: Constructus Interruptus

achievement.name: On Her Majesty's Secret Surface
achievement.description: Start capping a capture point within a second of it becoming available.

achievement.name: Insurance Fraud

achievement.name: Point Breaker

achievement.name: High Value Target

achievement.name: Come in From the Cold

achievement.name: Wetwork

achievement.name: You Only Shiv Thrice

achievement.name: Sap Auteur

achievement.name: Is It Safe?
achievement.description: Backstab 50 enemies who are capturing control points.

achievement.name: Slash and Burn

achievement.name: Diplomacy
achievement.description: Kill 50 enemies with the Ambassador.

achievement.name: Skullpluggery
achievement.description: Headshot 20 Snipers with the Ambassador.

achievement.name: Sleeper Agent

achievement.name: Who's Your Daddy?

achievement.name: Scared Stiff
achievement.description: Kill a player scared by a ghost.

achievement.name: Attack o' Lantern
achievement.description: Cause the deaths of 5 players by exploding nearby pumpkin bombs.

achievement.name: Costume Contest

achievement.name: Soldier Milestone 2

achievement.description: Achieve 17 of the achievements in the Soldier pack.

achievement.name: Tri-Splatteral Damage
achievement.description: Kill 3 enemies with a single critical rocket.

achievement.name: Death from Above
achievement.description: Rocket jump and kill 2 enemies before you land.

achievement.name: Dominator
achievement.description: Get 3 dominations in a single life.

achievement.name: War Crime and Punishment
achievement.description: In a single life, kill 3 enemies who have damaged a Medic that is healing you.

achievement.name: Spray of Defeat
achievement.description: Use a grenade to gib a player.

achievement.name: Guns of the Navar0wned
achievement.description: Kill 5 Engineer sentries while you are standing outside of their range.

achievement.name: Mutually Assured Destruction
achievement.description: Kill an enemy sniper with a rocket after he kills you.

achievement.name: Wings of Glory
achievement.description: Kill an enemy soldier while both you and the target are airborne.

achievement.name: Engineer to Eternity
achievement.description: Kill an Engineer as he repairs his sentry gun while it's under enemy fire.

achievement.name: Trench Warfare
achievement.description: Kill your nemesis with a shovel.

achievement.name: Where Eagles Dare
achievement.description: Get the highest possible rocket jump using jump and crouch.

achievement.name: Screamin' Eagle
achievement.description: Kill 20 enemies from above.

achievement.name: Crockets Are Such B.S.
achievement.description: Shoot two non-boosted crit rockets in a row.

achievement.name: Geneva Contravention
achievement.description: Kill 3 defenseless players after a single match has ended.

achievement.name: Semper Fry
achievement.description: Kill 20 enemies while you are on fire.

achievement.name: War Crime Spybunal
achievement.description: Kill a Spy who just backstabbed a teammate.

achievement.name: Hamburger Hill
achievement.description: Defend a cap point 30 times.

achievement.name: Frags of our Fathers
achievement.description: Gib 1000 people.

achievement.name: Duty Bound
achievement.description: While rocket jumping kill an enemy with the Equalizer before you land or just after landing.

achievement.name: The Boostie Boys
achievement.description: Buff 15 teammates with the Buff Banner in a single life.

achievement.name: Backdraft Dodger
achievement.description: Kill a Pyro who has airblasted one of your rockets in the last 10 seconds.

achievement.name: Ain't Got Time to Bleed
achievement.description: Kill 3 players with the Equalizer in a single life without being healed.

achievement.name: Near Death Experience
achievement.description: Kill 20 enemies with your Equalizer while you have less than 25 health.

achievement.name: For Whom the Shell Trolls
achievement.description: Bounce an opponent into the air with a rocket and then kill them with the shotgun before they land.

achievement.name: Brothers in Harms
achievement.description: Kill 10 enemies while assisting or being assisted by another Soldier.

achievement.name: Medals of Honor
achievement.description: Finish a round as an MVP on a team of 6 or more players 10 times.

achievement.name: S*M*A*S*H
achievement.description: Assist a Medic in exploding 5 enemies with a single ÜberCharge.

achievement.name: Shorn Connery
achievement.description: Decapitate a cloaked Spy.

achievement.name: Laddy Macdeth
achievement.description: Kill 50 enemies with direct hits from the Grenade Launcher.

achievement.name: Brainspotting
achievement.description: Decapitate 50 enemy players.

achievement.name: Left 4 Heads
achievement.description: Decapitate 4 players with only 10 seconds between each kill.

achievement.name: Well Plaid!
achievement.description: Kill 10 enemies while assisting or being assisted by another Demoman.

achievement.name: Slammy Slayvis Woundya
achievement.description: Decapitate an enemy Soldier who is brandishing the Equalizer.

achievement.name: Blind Fire
achievement.description: Destroy an Engineer building that you can't see with a direct hit from your Grenade Launcher.

achievement.name: Three Times a Laddy
achievement.description: Dominate 3 Engineers.

achievement.name: Caber Toss
achievement.description: Bounce an enemy into the air and kill them before they land.

achievement.name: There Can Be Only One
achievement.description: Decapitate your nemesis.

achievement.name: Demoman Milestone 1
achievement.description: Achieve 5 of the achievements in the Demoman pack.

achievement.name: Demoman Milestone 2
achievement.description: Achieve 11 of the achievements in the Demoman pack.

achievement.name: Demoman Milestone 3
achievement.description: Achieve 17 of the achievements in the Demoman pack.

achievement.name: Bravehurt
achievement.description: Kill 25 players defending a capture point or cart.

achievement.name: Cry Some Moor!
achievement.description: Destroy 50 buildings.

achievement.name: Glasg0wned
achievement.description: Kill 25 Scouts and Pyros with the Grenade Launcher.

achievement.name: The Targe Charge
achievement.description: Charge and kill someone with your shield bash.

achievement.name: Beat Me Up, Scotty
achievement.description: Use a critical swing with the Eyelander to kill 5 enemy players.

achievement.name: Bloody Merry
achievement.description: Provide an enemy player with a freeze cam of your smiling face.

achievement.name: Highland Fling
achievement.description: Sticky jump a really long way...

achievement.name: Revengineering
achievement.description: Use a revenge crit to kill the enemy player that destroyed your sentry gun.

achievement.name: Pownd on the Range
achievement.description: Kill 10 enemies outside the normal sentry gun range using the Wrangler.

achievement.name: Engineer Milestone 1
achievement.description: Achieve 5 of the achievements in the Engineer pack.

achievement.name: Engineer Milestone 2
achievement.description: Achieve 11 of the achievements in the Engineer pack.

achievement.name: Engineer Milestone 3
achievement.description: Achieve 17 of the achievements in the Engineer pack.

achievement.name: Battle Rustler
achievement.description: Teleport 100 team members into battle.

achievement.name: The Extinguished Gentleman
achievement.description: Have dispensers you built extinguish 20 burning players.

achievement.name: Unforgiven
achievement.description: Kill 3 enemies with revenge crits without dying.

achievement.name: Quick Draw
achievement.description: Kill a spy and two sappers within 10 seconds.

achievement.name: The Wrench Connection
achievement.description: Kill a disguised spy with your Wrench.

achievement.name: Silent Pardner
achievement.description: Upgrade 50 buildings built by other team members.

achievement.name: Fistful of Sappers
achievement.description: Destroy 25 sappers on buildings built by other team members.

achievement.name: Doc, Stock, and Barrel
achievement.description: Repair a sentry gun under fire while being healed by a Medic.

achievement.name: Frontier Justice
achievement.description: Have your sentry kill the enemy that just killed you within 10 seconds.

achievement.name: Uncivil Engineer
achievement.description: Provide an enemy player with a freeze cam of you and the sentry that just killed them.

achievement.name: Texas Two-Step
achievement.description: Use your shotgun to finish off an enemy recently damaged by your sentry gun.

achievement.name: Doc Holiday
achievement.description: Have a dispenser heal 3 teammates at the same time.

achievement.name: No Man's Land
achievement.description: Use a sentry gun to kill 25 enemy players that are capturing a point.

achievement.name: Death Metal
achievement.description: Pick up 10,000 waste metal from pieces of destroyed buildings.

achievement.name: Land Grab
achievement.description: Help a teammate construct a building.

achievement.name: Get Along!
achievement.description: Manage to get to and then remove a sapper placed on your building while you were several meters away.

achievement.name: Rio Grind
achievement.description: Perform 50 repairs and/or reloads on a Sentry gun being Wrangled by another Engineer.

achievement.name: Patent Protection
achievement.description: Destroy an enemy Engineer's sentry gun with a sentry under control of your Wrangler.

achievement.name: If You Build It, They Will Die
achievement.description: Haul a level 3 sentry gun into a position where it achieves a kill shortly after being redeployed.

achievement.name: Texas Ranger
achievement.description: Haul buildings 1 km over your career.

achievement.name: Deputized
achievement.description: Get 10 assists with another Engineer where a sentry gun was involved in the kill.

achievement.name: Sleepy Holl0WND
achievement.description: Kill the Horseless Headless Horsemann.

achievement.name: Masked Mann
achievement.description: Collect the Haunted Halloween Gift in Mann Manor.

achievement.name: That's a Wrap
achievement.description: Save your very first replay.

achievement.name: We Can Fix It In Post
achievement.description: While watching a replay, press space bar to enter the editor.

achievement.name: Riftwalker
achievement.description: Kill an enemy within 5 seconds of you traveling through an Engineer's teleporter.

achievement.name: Escape the Heat
achievement.description: Jump into a pool of refreshing water while on fire.

achievement.name: Optical Defusion
achievement.description: Kill MONOCULUS!

achievement.name: Dive Into a Good Book
achievement.description: Get to Loot Island and claim your reward!

achievement.name: With Friends Like these...
achievement.description: Play in a game with 7 or more players from your friends list.

achievement.name: Medical Breakthrough
achievement.description: Assist in destroying 5 enemy Engineer buildings with a single ÜberCharge on a Demoman.

achievement.name: Medical Intervention
achievement.description: Save a falling teammate from dying on impact.

achievement.name: Second Opinion
achievement.description: ÜberCharge 2 teammates at once.

achievement.name: Family Practice
achievement.description: ÜberCharge 5 of your Steam Community Friends.

achievement.name: Division of Labor
achievement.description: Kill 10 enemies with a Medic assisting you, where neither of you die.

achievement.name: Soviet Block
achievement.description: While invulnerable and on defense, block an invulnerable enemy Heavy's movement.

achievement.name: Krazy Ivan
achievement.description: Kill 50 enemies while both you and your victim are underwater.

achievement.name: Photostroika
achievement.description: Provide an enemy with a freezecam shot of you taunting while invulnerable.

achievement.name: First Blood, Part 2
achievement.description: Kill 5 enemies with the First Blood crit buff.

achievement.name: Quick Hook
achievement.description: Kill a player in Well before the round starts.

achievement.name: Doctoring the Ball
achievement.description: Kill 3 enemies while under the effects of a Medic's ÜberCharge.

achievement.name: Foul Territory
achievement.description: Cause an environmental death by stunning an enemy.

achievement.name: Brushback
achievement.description: Stun 50 enemies while they are capturing a point or pushing the cart.

achievement.name: Triple Play
achievement.description: Capture three capture points in a row in one life.

achievement.name: Block the Plate
achievement.description: Block 50 point captures.

achievement.name: Jumper Stumper
achievement.description: Kill a rocket or grenade-jumping enemy in midair with your Sniper Rifle or the Huntsman.

achievement.name: Jarate Chop
achievement.description: Jarate and then kill 3 enemies with your Kukri.

achievement.name: For Your Eyes Only
achievement.description: Provide an enemy with a freezecam shot of you flicking a cigarette onto their corpse.

achievement.name: The Man from P.U.N.C.T.U.R.E.
achievement.description: Stab an enemy while fencing.

achievement.name: Bomb Squaddie
achievement.description: Destroy 10 sticky bombs with the shotgun in a single life.

achievement.name: Banner of Brothers
achievement.description: Buff 5 steam friends at once with the Buff Banner.

achievement.name: The Longest Daze
achievement.description: Kill 5 stunned players.

achievement.name: Gore-a! Gore-a! Gore-a!
achievement.description: Provide the enemy with a freezecam of you taunting over 3 of their body parts.

achievement.name: Out, Damned Scot!
achievement.description: Kill 500 enemy Demomen

achievement.name: Death From Below
achievement.description: Kill 10 opponents who are airborne with the Direct Hit.

achievement.name: Worth a Thousand Words
achievement.description: Provide the enemy with a freezecam of your 21 gun salute.

achievement.name: Ride of the Valkartie
achievement.description: Ride the cart for 30 seconds.

achievement.name: Kilt in Action
achievement.description: Kill 500 enemy Soldiers

achievement.name: Tam O'Shatter
achievement.description: Destroy 5 enemy Engineer buildings during a single ÜberCharge from a Medic.

achievement.name: The Scottish Play
achievement.description: Get a melee kill while sticky jumping.

achievement.name: Loch Ness Bombster
achievement.description: Kill an enemy player with sticky bombs within 5 seconds of them teleporting.

achievement.name: Double Mauled Scotch
achievement.description: Kill 2 people in a single sticky jump.

achievement.name: Tartan Spartan
achievement.description: Do 1 million points of total blast damage.

achievement.name: The Argyle Sap
achievement.description: Blow up an Engineer, his sentry gun, and his dispenser with a single Sticky bomb detonation.

achievement.name: Scotch Guard
achievement.description: Kill 3 enemies capping or pushing a cart in a single Stickybomb detonation 3 separate times.

achievement.name: The Stickening
achievement.description: Kill 3 Heavies from full health with a single sticky bomb detonation.

achievement.name: Scotch Tap
achievement.description: Glory in the slaughter of your enemies using the Eyelander.

achievement.name: Something Stickied This Way Comes
achievement.description: Kill 30 players with air burst sticky bombs.

achievement.name: The High Road
achievement.description: Sticky jump onto a cap point and capture it.

achievement.name: Second Eye
achievement.description: Provide an enemy player with a freeze cam of you shaking your rump.

achievement.name: He Who Celt It
achievement.description: Use the Sticky Launcher to kill an enemy player via environmental damage.

achievement.name: Robbed Royal
achievement.description: Destroy 100 enemy sticky bombs with the Scottish Resistance.

achievement.name: Pipebagger
achievement.description: Kill at least three players with a single detonation of sticky bombs.

achievement.name: Spynal Tap
achievement.description: Kill 20 spies within 5 seconds of them sapping a friendly building.

achievement.name: Sticky Thump
achievement.description: Using the Scottish Resistance, kill 3 players in separate explosions without placing new sticky bombs.

achievement.name: Search Engine
achievement.description: Kill 3 cloaked Spies with a sentry gun under control of your Wrangler.

achievement.name: Building Block
achievement.description: Have a sentry shielded by the Wrangler absorb 500 damage without being destroyed.

achievement.name: Best Little Slaughterhouse in Texas
achievement.description: Rack up 5000 kills with your sentry guns.

achievement.name: Six-String Stinger
achievement.description: Provide an enemy player with a freeze cam of your guitar playing skills.

achievement.name: Trade Secrets
achievement.description: Kill 20 players carrying the intelligence.

achievement.name: How the Pests Was Gunned
achievement.description: Destroy 50 enemy stickybombs lying in range of friendly buildings.

achievement.name: Honky Tonk Man
achievement.description: Smash an enemy player's head in with your guitar.

achievement.name: Breaking Morant
achievement.description: Kill 10 Snipers with a sentry gun under control of your Wrangler.

achievement.name: Drugstore Cowboy
achievement.description: Have dispensers you created dispense a combined amount of 100,000 health over your career.

achievement.name: Circle the Wagons
achievement.description: Repair 50,000 damage to friendly buildings constructed by other players.

achievement.name: Built to Last
achievement.description: Help a single building tank over 2000 damage without being destroyed.

achievement.name: (Not So) Lonely Are the Brave
achievement.description: Keep a Heavy healed with your dispenser while he gains 5 kills.

achievement.name: Sackston Hale
achievement.description: Craft the Saxton Hale Mask.

achievement.name: Gored!
achievement.description: Collect the Horseless Headless Horsemann's Haunted Metal.

achievement.name: Time For Your Close-Up, Mr. Hale
achievement.description: Render a replay into a movie.

achievement.name: Ready for Duty
achievement.description: Complete each class to unlock the next.

achievement.name: Home Movie
achievement.description: Achieve 100 YouTube™ views for your movie.

achievement.name: Local Cinema Star
achievement.description: Achieve 1000 YouTube™ views for your movie.

achievement.name: Indie Film Sensation
achievement.description: Achieve 10,000 YouTube™ views for your movie.

achievement.name: Blockbuster
achievement.description: Achieve 100,000 YouTube™ views for your movie.

achievement.name: Star of My Own Show
achievement.description: Spend some time editing a replay.
